entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning late in the evening. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
